author: solprovider
msg: Modified lenya.sh to allow multiple instances of Lenya and add stop command.  Stops this instance before start attempts.  Reduced dependence on environment variables: LENYA_HOME is set to current directory, and JETTY_PORT is set here.

author: aconway
msg: Added qpidd --ack option  to set ack/solicit-ack interval. 0 disabled acks.
Sessions with 0 timeout never ack and don't store replay frames.
